Cylance is the first company to apply artificial intelligence, algorithmic science and machine learning to cyber security and improve the way companies, governments and end users proactively solve the worlds most difficult security problems. Using a breakthrough mathematical process, Cylance quickly and accurately identifies what is safe and what is a threat, not just whats in a blacklist or whitelist. By coupling sophisticated math and machine learning with a unique understanding of a hackers mentality, Cylance provides the technology and services to be truly predictive and preventive against advanced threats.

Product leadership role in managing initiative and execution planning to deliver front-end development workflow standardization with modern-day technology stacks to support new out-of-box product experience and UX/UI.Leadership role to develop visual direction and interaction design of mobile authentication apps (iOS and Android) to handle multiple factors and user accounts including soft token OTP, PUSH notification capabilities for single-tap authorization of login requests.Facilitated cross departmental collaboration strategy for product on-boarding prospective customers with engaging demos and automated setup utilities to drive faster POC conversion to sales revenue.Implemented concept and designed architecture for product themes to allow appearance modifications for end-user product application pages including single sign-on portals, help desk, user account management and authentication workflows as a key business differentiator.Creation of eco-system for custom product theme development for a seamless user experience for authenticating end-users to their organization’s branding.Develop close customer relationships from different industry verticals to design customized portal pages to support authentication workflow sequences that aligned to their individual enterprise or organization needs.Lead product design for a cloud-based authentication software-as-a-service product that offered 2-factor authentication solutions with voice, sms/text, email and RADIUS with single-tap authorization through a mobile app on iOS and Android platforms.Responsible for the interface design, front-end development, user experience and information architecture planning for a white-label Java version of our on-premise identity provider software application.

Coplex is an interactive agency based in Phoenix and Los Angeles that focuses on truly collaborative web design and development. We promote transparency and agility so that with our customers, we can create amazing new websites, applications and businesses.

When working at Swisscom Hospitality Services Rudy and I worked in separate operational units.  The unit I was engaged with provided temporary network services to corporate clients on a global basis.  These mission critical networks were built and managed in a wide variety of venues including the hotel portfolio managed by Swisscom Hospitality Services.  Often, clients and prospects of mine would require LAN/WAN networks in hotels where Rudy managed the property networks.  During these opportunities, Rudy and I collaborated on creating client proposals as well as aspects of project management.  In every case, Rudy was a true professional as a colleague and as a service provider to our clients.  There was an ease of doing business with Rudy - his dedication, efficient follow up and genuine interest in taking care of our clients was always appreciated and of considerable value.
